ebe nchekwa ohere ohere: Ebe nchekwa na-adịghị agbanwe agbanwe ebe echekwara mmemme na data na-agba ọsọ
diski ike: Ngwa nchekwa buru ibu na-adịghị agbanwe agbanwe na-eji platter magnetik
steeti siri ike: Nchekwa na-adịghị agbanwe agbanwe na-eji ebe nchekwa flash, ngwa ngwa karịa HDDs
\u1ee5gb\u1ecd ala: Ụzọ maka data iji gaa n'etiti akụrụngwa
ngwa\u1ecdr\u1ee5 ntinye: Na-enye ohere ntinye data n'ime kọmputa (dị ka ahụigodo, òké)
ngwa\u1ecdr\u1ee5 mmep\u1ee5ta: Na-enye onye ọrụ rịzọlt (dị ka nyochaa, ngwa nbipute)
motherboard: Isi bọọdụ sekit na-ejikọ akụkụ kọmpụta niile
netw\u1ecdk k\u1ecdmputa: Nchịkọta ngwaọrụ ejikọrọ ọnụ nwere ike ịkekọrịta akụrụngwa
adrees\u1ecb ip: Ihe nchọpụta ọnụọgụ pụrụ iche ekenyere ngwaọrụ ọ bụla na netwọkụ
bandwit: Ọnụego mbufe data kachasị n'ofe ụzọ netwọkụ
latency: Oge igbu oge maka data iji gaa site na isi iyi ruo ebe njedebe
